summary: This mod makes Vignar appear a bit younger than normal while still looking like and older man.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes Vignar appear a bit younger than normal while still looking like and older man. I also changed his skin tone in order to have him more closely resemble his family members. His outfit will also be changed to the one shown in the pictures.

There are two download options. One file is for charcoal grey colored hair while the other is for a more lore-friendly lighter shade.

To Install:
Place the .esp and .bsa into your Skyrim's data folder. Check the .esp file in the game launcher.

Recommended Mods:
High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141
High Quality Eyes by Xenius - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/49

Other Mods:
Better J'zargo - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35220
Better Ysolda - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21056
Better Ulfric - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27323/?
Better Karliah - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41109
author: Noobpwnerking
